Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Interface LogFormatter

All Known Subinterfaces:
LogFormatter.EventFormatter, LogFormatter.KeyValuesFormatter, LogFormatter.LevelFormatter, LogFormatter.MessageFormatter, LogFormatter.NameFormatter, LogFormatter.ThreadFormatter, LogFormatter.ThrowableFormatter, LogFormatter.TimestampFormatter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractStandardEventFormatter, JansiLogFormatter, LogFormatter.NoopFormatter, LogFormatter.StaticFormatter, StandardEventFormatter
public sealed interface LogFormatter permits LogFormatter.EventFormatter, LogFormatter.TimestampFormatter, LogFormatter.ThrowableFormatter, LogFormatter.KeyValuesFormatter, LogFormatter.LevelFormatter, LogFormatter.NameFormatter, LogFormatter.ThreadFormatter, LogFormatter.StaticFormatter, LogFormatter.MessageFormatter
Formats a log event using a StringBuilder. All formatters should be threadsafe!.

The appender will make sure the StringBuilder is not shared with multiple threads so the formatter does not have to synchronize/lock on and should definitely not do that.

See Also:
  • LogFormatter.EventFormatter
  • LogEncoder.of(LogFormatter)
API Note
This class is sealed. An interface that has the same contract that can be implemented is LogFormatter.EventFormatter.

      Returns:

    • padRight

      static void padRight(StringBuilder sb, CharSequence s, int n)
      Pads the right hand side of text with space.
      Parameters:
      sb - buffer.
      s - string that will be appended first (left hand) and will not be longer than the n parameter.
      n - the size of string. If the size is bigger than passed in string the result will have padding otherwise the passed in string will be cut to the size of this parameter.

    • padLeft

      static void padLeft(StringBuilder sb, CharSequence s, int n)
      Pads the left hand side of text with space.
      Parameters:
      sb - buffer.
      s - string that will be appended second (right hand) and will not be longer than the n parameter.
      n - the size of string. If the size is bigger than passed in string the result will have padding otherwise the passed in string will be cut to the size of this parameter.
